select bf.* from board_folder as bf where bf.board_folder_sn = #{boardFolderSn}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_folder (board_folder_dept, board_folder_name, board_folder_upper_sn, board_folder_child_yn, board_folder_path, board_folder_sort, board_folder_reg_date, board_folder_reg_emp_sn) VALUES (#{boardFolderDept}, #{boardFolderName}, #{boardFolderUpperSn}, 'N', #{boardFolderPath}, #{boardFolderSort}, NOW(), #{boardFolderRegEmpSn})
